text: Videoclip.bg is a video sharing site available for free video uploads in Bulgarian language. It was created in 2011 by Richard Hristov. The site is owned by Ð¥elerium LTD, whose owner is Richard Hristov. Its headquarters are located in the city of Plovdiv, Bulgaria. The site uses the services of the hosting company "Telepoint". As of November 2019, Videoclip.bg ranks among the Top 50 sites in terms of visits in Bulgaria. == References == == Other websites == * VideoClip.bg * Category:Video sharing websites Category:Bulgarian culture Category:2011 establishments in Europe
title: Videoclip.bg
